Package MainLauncher

Class Player2D

This class is to display the automata themselves.

      • Player2D

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public static void display​(Automaton automaton,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           int size)

"size" field describes the size of the single cell (it's edge, they are squares).
The automaton is the automaton to be played.
This method creates the window with grid being the automaton, it has two buttons to adjust the time of each step.

When the automaton is drawn, the daemon redrawing it and waiting the time given in a variable is enabled.
The variable of time is modified when buttons are used.
Way of changing is given by automatons nextState method which returns the changes to be redrawn.

      • Colour

        public static javafx.scene.paint.Paint Colour​(CellState state)

This metohod accepts the state of the cell and returns the color that it should be drawn with.
Actually the Color class could be returned instead of Paint.

      • displayLA

        public static void displayLA​(LangtonAnt automaton,
                             java.lang.String title,
                             int size)

This method is used in display method to draw the ant when the automaton used is instance of LangtonAnt class.
